title: Progress Tracking
subtitle: Track your face analyses and progress

premiumFeature.title: Premium Feature
premiumFeature.description: Progress tracking, charts, and comparative analysis features are exclusive to Premium members.
premiumFeature.preview: With Premium, you can track your face analyses over time, see your progress, and receive personalized exercise recommendations.

exerciseStats.title: Exercise Statistics
exerciseStats.summaryText: Average completion rate for all exercises in this region

emptyState.title: No Analyses Yet

tip.title: Tip:
tip.description: You can strengthen your facial muscles and improve your symmetry by exercising regularly. Click on each region to view recommended exercises.
